english.segment1: You're thinking, You're thinking. You want to do what's right. I'm waiting I'm waiting. Just trying to stay alive
english.segment2: Here you go, I see you moving. Here you come, my hand is raised. Come and lift me from the pit and. Lead me on to better days
english.segment3: You're thinking, You're thinking. You want to do what's right. I'm waiting, still waiting. Surely God's love is not blind

english.segment5: If you see me please don't walk on by. If you hear me calling, please don't ignore my cry. Will you cross the borders to save me . Will you cross the borders & save someone like me
